siteMetadata.title: Rust Interop
siteMetadata.description: Overview of foreign language interop option for the Rust programming language

frontmatter.title: autocxx
frontmatter.description: This project is a tool for calling C++ from Rust in a heavily automated, but safe, fashion. Think of autocxx as glue which plugs bindgen into cxx.

frontmatter.title: cbindgen
frontmatter.description: cbindgen creates C/C++11 headers for Rust libraries which expose a public C API.

frontmatter.title: cbindgen
frontmatter.description: cbindgen creates C/C++11 headers for Rust libraries which expose a public C API.

frontmatter.title: cc-rs
frontmatter.description: A library to compile C/C++/assembly into a Rust library/application.

frontmatter.title: rust-cpython
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for the python interpreter.

frontmatter.title: rust-cpython
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for the python interpreter.

frontmatter.title: CXX
frontmatter.description: This library provides a safe mechanism for calling C++ code from Rust and Rust code from C++

frontmatter.title: CXX
frontmatter.description: This library provides a safe mechanism for calling C++ code from Rust and Rust code from C++

frontmatter.title: DUSTR
frontmatter.description: Dart - rust - Flutter compatibility

frontmatter.title: ext-php-rs
frontmatter.description: Bindings and abstractions for the PHP API, making it easy to write native, low-level PHP extensions in Rust.

frontmatter.title: extendr
frontmatter.description: A safe and user friendly R extension interface using Rust

frontmatter.title: Flutter Rust Bridge
frontmatter.description: High-level memory-safe binding generator for Flutter/Dart <-> Rust

frontmatter.title: Helix
frontmatter.description: Helix allows you to write Ruby classes in Rust without having to write the glue code yourself.

frontmatter.title: hlua
frontmatter.description: This library is a high-level binding for Lua 5.2.

frontmatter.title: inline-python
frontmatter.description: Inline Python code directly in your Rust code.

frontmatter.title: j4rs
frontmatter.description: j4rs stands for 'Java for Rust' and allows effortless calls to Java code from Rust and vice-versa.

frontmatter.title: j4rs
frontmatter.description: j4rs stands for 'Java for Rust' and allows effortless calls to Java code from Rust and vice-versa.

frontmatter.title: jlrs
frontmatter.description: The main goal behind jlrs is to provide a simple and safe interface to the Julia C API.

frontmatter.title: milksnake
frontmatter.description: Milksnake is an extension for setuptools that allows you to distribute dynamic linked libraries in Python wheels in the most portable way imaginable.

frontmatter.title: napi-rs
frontmatter.description: A minimal library for building compiled Node add-ons in Rust, wrapping Node.js N-API.

frontmatter.title: neon-bindings
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for writing safe and fast native Node.js modules. Wraps V8 API at the moment, Node.js N-API support is work in progress.

frontmatter.title: node-bindgen
frontmatter.description: Easy way to write Node.js module using Rust, wrapping Node.js N-API.

frontmatter.title: PyO3
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for Python. This includes running and interacting with Python code from a Rust binary, as well as writing native Python modules.

frontmatter.title: PyO3
frontmatter.description: Rust bindings for Python. This includes running and interacting with Python code from a Rust binary, as well as writing native Python modules.

frontmatter.title: r-rust Hello Rust template
frontmatter.description: Template R package with rust bindings

frontmatter.title: rlua
frontmatter.description: This library is a high level interface between Rust and Lua. Its goal is to be an easy to use, practical, flexible, and safe API between Rust and Lua.

frontmatter.title: rnet
frontmatter.description: Easily call into Rust from C# or other .net langauges.

frontmatter.title: robusta
frontmatter.description: This library provides a procedural macro to make easier to write JNI-compatible code in Rust. It can perform automatic conversion of Rust-y input and output types

frontmatter.title: Ruru
frontmatter.description: Native Ruby extensions in Rust

frontmatter.title: rust-cpp
frontmatter.description: rust-cpp is a build tool & macro which enables you to write C++ code inline in your rust code.

frontmatter.title: rust_swig
frontmatter.description: Tool for connecting programs or libraries written in Rust with other languages. Currently implemented support for C++ and Java, but you can write support for any language of your choice.

frontmatter.title: rust_swig
frontmatter.description: Tool for connecting programs or libraries written in Rust with other languages. Currently implemented support for C++ and Java, but you can write support for any language of your choice.

frontmatter.title: Rustler
frontmatter.description: Rustler is a library for writing Erlang NIFs in safe Rust code. The library provides functionality for both Erlang and Elixir.

frontmatter.title: Rustler
frontmatter.description: Rustler is a library for writing Erlang NIFs in safe Rust code. The library provides functionality for both Erlang and Elixir.

frontmatter.title: Rutie
frontmatter.description: Integrate Ruby with your Rust application. Or integrate Rust with your Ruby application. Continuation of ruru and ruby-sys.

frontmatter.title: Rutie
frontmatter.description: Integrate Ruby with your Rust application. Or integrate Rust with your Ruby application. Continuation of ruru and ruby-sys.
